query:
SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edc_literature_references) as total_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT edc_id) FROM edc_literature_references) as edcs_with_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edc_chemicals) as total_edcs
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2bdzn41uM6mMWcv.97707ddd6929 --database 3gcYftfyZmb2335Uoynmho --execute SELECT 
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edc_literature_references) as total_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT edc_id) FROM edc_literature_references) as edcs_with_articles,
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM edc_chemicals) as total_edcs
